name: Arizona Bankruptcy Attorney
tag_list: arizona-bankruptcy-attorney, arizona-bankruptcy-lawyer, arizona-car-accident-lawyer, phoenix-bankruptcy, chandler-bankruptcy-attorney, chandler-bankruptcy-lawyer, chandler-arizona-personal-injury
overview:
Arizona Bankruptcy Attorney. Arizona Bankruptcy and Personal Injury Lawyers. Free consultation and experienced service. Top Phoenix Arizona Attorneys.

The attorneys at Mostafavi, Marco & Wimmer, PLLC are compassionate and treat every client with respect and dignity. We fight for you in every aspect of your case.

Our consultations are free, and our goal for each consultation is to educate clients on all aspects of their bankruptcy or personal injury case. We work hard to reduce your stress as we develop an effective big picture strategy. We have over 35 years of legal experience and all cases are handled by one of our attorneys, not a paralegal. Our bankruptcy fees are very competitive and we do not charge for personal injury representation unless we settle your case.
